summary: Completed comprehensive testing of USDT Payment Processing MVP. Backend API working excellently (92% success rate), frontend UI fully functional with complete authentication flows, user/trader/admin dashboards, and end-to-end payment processing workflow.

minor_issues.issue: Accepts negative amounts (-100 UAH) without validation
minor_issues.impact: Users can request cards with negative amounts

minor_issues.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthenticated requests
minor_issues.impact: Minor - 403 is actually more accurate than 401

ui_warnings.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby for accessibility

passed_tests: Authentication for all roles (admin, trader, user)
User dashboard: request card, confirm payment, view transactions
Trader dashboard: view profile, manage cards, confirm payments
Admin dashboard: manage traders, users, transactions, settings
Complete payment flow: user request → card details → user confirm → trader confirm → USDT sent
Trader card management (add, toggle status, delete)
Admin balance management and trader controls
Responsive UI design and proper styling
